name: Rowlet
desc: Rowlet is an unevolved Pokemon with grass and flying typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Dartrix

forms.name: Lycanroc

forms.name: Wishiwashi School
forms.desc: Wishiwashi School Form is a unique transformation of Wishiwashi. In this form, it gains increased stats and becomes a formidable force in battle.

forms.name: Wishiwashi
forms.desc: Wishiwashi Solo Form is the default form of Wishiwashi. It is much weaker on its own compared to its School Form.

name: Mareanie
desc: Mareanie is an unevolved Pokemon with poison and water typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Toxapex
desc: Toxapex is a fully evolved Pokemon with poison and water typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Mudbray
desc: Mudbray is an unevolved Pokemon with ground typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Mudsdale
desc: Mudsdale is a fully evolved Pokemon with ground typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Dewpider
desc: Dewpider is an unevolved Pokemon with water and bug typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Araquanid
desc: Araquanid is a fully evolved Pokemon with water and bug typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Fomantis
desc: Fomantis is an unevolved Pokemon with grass typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Lurantis
desc: Lurantis is a fully evolved Pokemon with grass typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Morelull
desc: Morelull is an unevolved Pokemon with grass and fairy typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Shiinotic
desc: Shiinotic is a fully evolved Pokemon with grass and fairy typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Salandit
desc: Salandit is an unevolved Pokemon with poison and fire typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Salazzle
desc: Salazzle is a fully evolved Pokemon with poison and fire typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Stufful
desc: Stufful is an unevolved Pokemon with normal and fighting typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Bewear
desc: Bewear is a fully evolved Pokemon with normal and fighting typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Bounsweet
desc: Bounsweet is an unevolved Pokemon with grass typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Steenee
desc: Steenee is an unevolved Pokemon with grass typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Tsareena
desc: Tsareena is a fully evolved Pokemon with grass typing. It has various abilities and is strong against certain types but weak to others.

name: Comfey
desc: Comfey is a Fairy-type Pokemon known for its healing abilities. It is often seen carrying around flower garlands and offering them to others as a sign of affection and healing.

name: Oranguru
desc: Oranguru is a dual-type Normal and Psychic Pokemon known for its wisdom and intellect. It is often seen holding a fan of leaves, which it uses to communicate and make strategic decisions.

name: Passimian
desc: Passimian is a Fighting-type Pokemon known for its strong teamwork and athleticism. It is often seen playing a game similar to rugby with its fellow Passimian to build camaraderie.

name: Wimpod
desc: Wimpod is an unevolved Pokemon with Bug and Water typing. It is known for its timid and cautious nature, often fleeing from danger by using its quick swimming abilities.

name: Golisopod
desc: Golisopod is a fully evolved Pokemon with Bug and Water typing. It is a formidable and protective fighter that can switch out of battle to heal its wounds.

name: Sandygast
desc: Sandygast is an unevolved Pokemon with Ghost and Ground typing. It is known for its eerie appearance and the ability to possess sand to create its body.

name: Palossand
desc: Palossand is a fully evolved Pokemon with Ghost and Ground typing. It constructs elaborate sandcastles to lure and trap prey, making it a cunning predator.

name: Pyukumuku
desc: Pyukumuku is a Water-type Pokemon with a unique appearance. It has the ability to expel its organs as a defense mechanism, making it a resilient and hardy creature.

name: Type: Null
desc: Type: Null is a Legendary Pokemon known for its adaptability. It was artificially created to possess multiple forms, each with a different elemental typing.

name: Silvally
desc: Silvally is a Legendary Pokemon known for its versatility. It can change its type by holding special memory items, making it a valuable asset in battles.

name: Minior
desc: Minior is a unique Rock/Flying-type Pokemon that hides inside a protective meteor-like shell. It can change its core color and form as it takes damage in battle.

name: Komala
desc: Komala is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its constant slumber. It clings to a log pillow and rarely wakes up, even in battle, as it can perform moves while sleeping.

name: Turtonator
desc: Turtonator is a dual-type Fire and Dragon Pokemon known for its explosive personality. It has a shell covered in explosive spines and can launch devastating fire attacks.

name: Togedemaru
desc: Togedemaru is a dual-type Electric and Steel Pokemon recognized for its cute appearance and defensive capabilities. It can curl into a spiky ball for protection.

name: Mimikyu
desc: Mimikyu is a unique Ghost and Fairy-type Pokemon that disguises itself to avoid being seen. It wears a Pikachu costume but is shy and craves friendship.

name: Bruxish
desc: Bruxish is a Water and Psychic-type Pokemon known for its vibrant colors and peculiar appearance. It has a strong jaw and uses psychic powers to disorient prey.

name: Drampa
desc: Drampa is a dual-type Normal and Dragon Pokemon that resembles a friendly dragon. It can emit soothing winds and has a protective nature toward children.

name: Dhelmise
desc: Dhelmise is a unique Pokemon that resembles an anchor covered in seaweed. It is known for its eerie appearance and ghostly abilities. Dhelmise is a Grass and Ghost type Pokemon.

name: Jangmo-o
desc: Jangmo-o is a small and timid Dragon type Pokemon. It is often found in mountainous areas and is known for its strong will to become stronger. Jangmo-o is the first stage of its evolutionary line.

name: Hakamo-o
desc: Hakamo-o is the evolved form of Jangmo-o. It gains the Fighting type in addition to Dragon type as it matures. Hakamo-o is known for its skill in martial arts and is a formidable fighter.

name: Kommo-o
desc: Kommo-o is the final evolution of Jangmo-o and Hakamo-o. It is a powerful Dragon and Fighting type Pokemon known for its impressive defensive scales. Kommo-o's signature move is the Clanging Scales attack.

name: Tapu Koko
desc: Tapu Koko is one of the guardian deities of the Alola region and is a Legendary Pokemon. It is an Electric and Fairy type, known for its incredible speed and agility. Tapu Koko is a symbol of protection in Alola.

name: Tapu Lele
desc: Tapu Lele is another guardian deity of the Alola region and is a Legendary Pokemon. It is a Psychic and Fairy type, known for its mystical powers and the ability to create illusions.

name: Tapu Bulu
desc: Tapu Bulu is one of the guardian deities of the Alola region and is a Legendary Pokemon. It is a Grass and Fairy type, known for its control over nature and its protective nature.

name: Tapu Fini
desc: Tapu Fini is a guardian deity of the Alola region and is a Legendary Pokemon. It is a Water and Fairy type, known for its control over water and its ability to cleanse and purify.

name: Cosmog
desc: Cosmog is a unique Legendary Pokemon that has the power to create and manipulate dimensions. It is a Psychic type and is often associated with the creation of new worlds.

name: Cosmoem
desc: Cosmoem is the evolved form of Cosmog and retains its Psychic type. It has incredible defensive capabilities and can withstand attacks while it prepares for its next evolution.

name: Solgaleo
desc: Solgaleo is a Legendary Pokemon known as the 'Beast that Devours the Sun.' It is a Psychic and Steel type with incredible strength and the ability to radiate intense heat and light.

name: Lunala
desc: Lunala is a Legendary Pokemon known as the 'Beast that Calls the Moon.' It is a Psychic and Ghost type with the ability to control and manipulate moonlight.

name: Nihilego
desc: Nihilego is an Ultra Beast known for its otherworldly appearance and mysterious origin. It is a Rock and Poison type and is often associated with the void and unknown dimensions.

name: Buzzwole
desc: Buzzwole is an Ultra Beast with a muscular and imposing physique. It is a Bug and Fighting type Pokemon, known for its incredible strength and power.

name: Pheromosa
desc: Pheromosa is an Ultra Beast known for its grace and agility. It is a Bug and Fighting type Pokemon, and its movements are said to be as beautiful as a dance.

name: Xurkitree
desc: Xurkitree is an Ultra Beast resembling a network of electrical wires. It is an Electric type Pokemon known for its electrical powers and ability to generate energy.

name: Celesteela
desc: Celesteela is an Ultra Beast resembling a majestic rocket ship. It is a Steel and Flying type Pokemon with the ability to launch itself into the sky using powerful jets.

name: Kartana
desc: Kartana is an Ultra Beast known for its sharp and paper-like body. It is a Grass and Steel type Pokemon, and its signature move, Leaf Blade, is incredibly sharp.

name: Guzzlord
desc: Guzzlord is an Ultra Beast known for its insatiable appetite. It is a Dark and Dragon type Pokemon, and its hunger is said to be endless.

name: Necrozma
desc: Necrozma is a Legendary Pokemon that can take on different forms by fusing with other Legendary Pokemon. Its base form is Psychic type, but it can become Dawn Wings Necrozma, Dusk Mane Necrozma, or Ultra Necrozma with unique typings.

name: Magearna
desc: Magearna is a Legendary Pokemon known for its mechanical and fairy-like appearance. It is a Steel and Fairy type Pokemon, often associated with advanced technology and elegance.

name: Marshadow
desc: Marshadow is a mysterious and Legendary Pokemon that can conceal itself in shadows. It is a Fighting and Ghost type, known for its stealthy and agile movements.

name: Caterpie
desc: Caterpie is a small and worm-like Pokemon with a voracious appetite for leaves. It is a Bug type Pokemon and is often one of the first Pokemon encountered by new Trainers.

name: Metapod
desc: Metapod is the evolved form of Caterpie. It is known for its protective cocoon-like shell. Metapod is a Bug type Pokemon that focuses on defense rather than offense.

name: Butterfree
desc: Butterfree is the final evolution of Caterpie and Metapod. It is a graceful Bug and Flying type Pokemon known for its colorful wings and the ability to release powdery scales.

name: Rattata
desc: Rattata is a small and swift Normal type Pokemon known for its quick movements. It has an Alolan form with the additional Dark type, giving it a unique twist in the Alola region.

name: Raticate
desc: Raticate is the evolved form of Rattata. It is a Normal type Pokemon known for its sharp teeth and strong biting capabilities. It also has an Alolan form with the Dark type.

name: Spearow
desc: Spearow is a small and aggressive Normal and Flying type Pokemon. It is known for its sharp beak and quick strikes. Spearow often travels in flocks.

name: Fearow
desc: Fearow is the evolved form of Spearow. It is a large and fast-flying Pokemon known for its long neck and sharp beak. Fearow is a Normal and Flying type.

name: Pikachu
desc: Pikachu is one of the most iconic and beloved Pokemon. It is an Electric type known for its lightning bolt-shaped tail. Pikachu has a special form wearing different hats for various occasions.

name: Raichu
desc: Raichu is the evolved form of Pikachu. It is an Electric type Pokemon known for its speed and electrical abilities. In the Alola region, it has an Alolan form with the additional Psychic type.

name: Sandshrew
desc: Sandshrew is a Ground type Pokemon known for its tough skin and burrowing abilities. In the Alola region, it has an Alolan form with the Ice and Steel types, adapting to the cold climate.

name: Sandslash
desc: Sandslash is the evolved form of Sandshrew. It is a Ground type Pokemon known for its sharp spines and digging abilities. In the Alola region, it has an Alolan form with the Ice and Steel types.

name: Clefairy
desc: Clefairy is a Fairy type Pokemon known for its cute appearance and affinity for the moon. It is often associated with the moon's mystical powers and is a common sight in fairy tales.

name: Clefable
desc: Clefable is the evolved form of Clefairy. It is a Fairy type Pokemon known for its graceful and elegant demeanor. Clefable is said to bring good fortune to those who encounter it.

name: Vulpix
desc: Vulpix is a Fox Pokemon known for its beautiful and icy Alolan form. It is a Fire type with a majestic appearance, and its Alolan variant has the Ice type, perfectly suited to snowy environments.

name: Ninetales
desc: Ninetales is the evolved form of Vulpix. It is a Fire type Pokemon known for its mystical and elegant appearance. In the Alola region, it has an Alolan form with the Ice and Fairy types.

name: Jigglypuff
desc: Jigglypuff is a cute and round Pokemon known for its soothing lullabies. It is a Normal and Fairy type and is often seen in performances where it can put others to sleep with its singing.

name: Wigglytuff
desc: Wigglytuff is the evolved form of Jigglypuff. It is a Normal and Fairy type Pokemon known for its fluffy and friendly demeanor. Despite its cute appearance, it can be a powerful battler.

name: Zubat
desc: Zubat is a Bat Pokemon known for its nocturnal habits and echolocation. It is a Poison and Flying type and can be found in caves and dark places.

name: Golbat
desc: Golbat is the evolved form of Zubat. It is a Poison and Flying type Pokemon known for its large wings and sharp fangs. Golbat is often associated with haunting and spooky locations.

name: Paras
desc: Paras is a unique Pokemon with mushrooms growing on its back. It is a Bug and Grass type and is known for its symbiotic relationship with the mushrooms, which can be used in various ways.

name: Parasect
desc: Parasect is the evolved form of Paras. It is a Bug and Grass type Pokemon, and the mushrooms on its back fully take over its body. Parasect is often found in damp forested areas.

name: Diglett
desc: Diglett is a small and mole-like Pokemon known for its burrowing abilities. It is a Ground type and can have an Alolan form with the additional Steel type.

name: Dugtrio
desc: Dugtrio is the evolved form of Diglett. It is a trio of small mole-like Pokemon that work together. Dugtrio is a Ground type and can have an Alolan form with the Steel type.

name: Meowth
desc: Meowth is a cat-like Pokemon known for its love of shiny objects. It is a Normal type and is often associated with fortune and wealth. Meowth has an Alolan form with the Dark type.

name: Persian
desc: Persian is the evolved form of Meowth. It is a Normal type Pokemon known for its elegance and grace. In the Alola region, it has an Alolan form with the Dark type.

name: Psyduck
desc: Psyduck is a Water type Pokemon known for its perpetual headache, which intensifies when it uses its Psychic powers. It is often found near bodies of water.

name: Golduck
desc: Golduck is the evolved form of Psyduck. It is a Water type Pokemon known for its strong swimming abilities and psychic powers. Golduck is often seen in aquatic environments.

name: Mankey
desc: Mankey is a small and aggressive Fighting type Pokemon known for its short temper and powerful punches. It is often found in mountainous regions.

name: Primeape
desc: Primeape is the evolved form of Mankey. It is a Fighting type Pokemon known for its fiery temperament and the ability to unleash powerful physical attacks when angered.

name: Primeape
desc: Primeape is a Fighting-type Pokemon known for its fierce and aggressive nature. It becomes even more enraged in battle.

name: Growlithe
desc: Growlithe is a Fire-type Pokemon that resembles a puppy. It is known for its loyalty and strong sense of smell.

name: Arcanine
desc: Arcanine is a majestic Fire-type Pokemon often referred to as the 'Legendary Pokemon.' It is known for its speed and bravery.

name: Poliwag
desc: Poliwag is a Water-type Pokemon with a distinctive swirl pattern on its belly. It is often seen swimming in freshwater ponds.

name: Poliwhirl
desc: Poliwhirl is the evolved form of Poliwag. It has developed stronger swimming skills and is known for its agility in the water.

name: Poliwrath
desc: Poliwrath is a Water/Fighting-type Pokemon with powerful muscles. It is a skilled swimmer and fighter.

name: Abra
desc: Abra is a Psychic-type Pokemon known for its psychic abilities. It is said to sleep for most of the day to conserve energy.

name: Kadabra
desc: Kadabra is the evolved form of Abra. It possesses formidable psychic powers and is known for its use of spoons.

name: Alakazam
desc: Alakazam is a Psychic-type Pokemon with an extremely high IQ. Its Mega Evolution further enhances its psychic abilities.

name: Machop
desc: Machop is a Fighting-type Pokemon known for its impressive physical strength. It trains tirelessly to become stronger.

name: Machoke
desc: Machoke is the evolved form of Machop. It has even greater physical power and is often seen helping with heavy labor.

name: Machamp
desc: Machamp is the final evolution of Machop. It is known for its incredible strength and the ability to punch at lightning-fast speeds.

name: Tentacool
desc: Tentacool is a Water/Poison-type Pokemon that dwells in oceans. Its tentacles are equipped with toxic stingers.

name: Tentacruel
desc: Tentacruel is the evolved form of Tentacool. It has even longer and more powerful tentacles that it uses to catch prey.

name: Geodude
desc: Geodude is a dual-type Rock/Ground Pokemon. The Alolan form of Geodude has an additional Electric typing.

name: Graveler
desc: Graveler is an evolved form of Geodude. It retains its dual Rock/Ground typing. The Alolan form has an additional Electric typing.

name: Golem
desc: Golem is the final evolution of Geodude. It is known for its immense strength and the ability to roll at high speeds.

name: Slowpoke
desc: Slowpoke is a Water/Psychic-type Pokemon known for its relaxed and unhurried nature. It often daydreams by the water's edge.

name: Slowbro
desc: Slowbro is known for its remarkable defensive capabilities. Its Mega Evolution enhances its psychic powers, allowing it to use telekinesis.

name: Magnemite
desc: Magnemite is a dual-type Electric/Steel Pokemon. It is known for its magnetic properties and the ability to generate powerful electromagnetic fields.

name: Magneton
desc: Magneton is an evolved form of Magnemite. It retains its Electric/Steel typing and has a strong attraction to metal objects.

name: Grimer
desc: Grimer is a Poison-type Pokemon known for its slimy appearance. The Alolan form of Grimer has a unique Poison/Dark typing.

name: Muk
desc: Muk is a Poison-type Pokemon that evolves from Grimer. The Alolan form of Muk has a distinct Poison/Dark typing.

name: Shellder
desc: Shellder is a Water-type Pokemon known for its bivalve shell. It evolves into Cloyster when exposed to a Water Stone.

name: Cloyster
desc: Cloyster is a Water/Ice-type Pokemon that evolves from Shellder. Its shell is extremely hard and durable, providing excellent protection.

name: Gastly
desc: Gastly is a Ghost/Poison-type Pokemon. It is known for its ability to phase through walls and its toxic gas.

name: Haunter
desc: Haunter is the evolved form of Gastly. It retains its Ghost/Poison typing and is known for its mischievous nature.

name: Gengar
desc: Gengar is a Ghost/Poison-type Pokemon known for its sinister appearance. Its Mega Evolution enhances its power and speed.

name: Drowzee
desc: Drowzee is a Psychic-type Pokemon known for its sleep-inducing abilities. It is often associated with dreams and nightmares.

name: Hypno
desc: Hypno is the evolved form of Drowzee. It is a Psychic-type Pokemon with powerful hypnotic powers.

name: Hypno
desc: Hypno is a Psychic-type Pokemon known for its hypnotic abilities. It uses its pendulum-like tail to induce deep sleep in others.

name: Exeggcute
desc: Exeggcute is a Grass/Psychic-type Pokemon that resembles a cluster of eggs. It has telepathic abilities and communicates with others.

name: Exeggutor
desc: Exeggutor is a Grass/Psychic-type Pokemon known for its tall and towering appearance. The Alolan form has a Dragon typing.

name: Cubone
desc: Cubone is a Ground-type Pokemon that wears the skull of its deceased mother as a helmet. It is known for its melancholic nature.

name: Marowak
desc: Marowak is a Ground-type Pokemon and the evolved form of Cubone. The Alolan form has Fire/Ghost typings.

name: Chansey
desc: Chansey is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its incredible egg-shaped pouch. It is a kind and caring Pokemon.

name: Kangaskhan
desc: Kangaskhan is a Normal-type Pokemon that carries its baby in a pouch. Its Mega Evolution enhances its parental instincts and power.

name: Goldeen
desc: Goldeen is a Water-type Pokemon known for its graceful swimming. Its dorsal fin is said to be a symbol of beauty.

name: Seaking
desc: Seaking is a Water-type Pokemon with a distinctive horn on its head. It is known for its agility and swift swimming.

name: Staryu
desc: Staryu is a Water-type Pokemon that resembles a starfish. Its core emits a bright and powerful light.

name: Starmie
desc: Starmie is a Water/Psychic-type Pokemon known for its mysterious and extraterrestrial origins. It is a powerful Psychic-type.

name: Scyther
desc: Scyther is a Bug/Flying-type Pokemon known for its speed and sharp scythes for hands. It is a skilled predator.

name: Electabuzz
desc: Electabuzz is an Electric-type Pokemon known for its electrical abilities. It emits strong electric discharges when excited.

name: Magmar
desc: Magmar is a Fire-type Pokemon known for its fiery body. It often resides near active volcanoes.

name: Pinsir
desc: Pinsir is a Bug-type Pokemon known for its powerful pincers. Its Mega Evolution gains a Flying typing and increased strength.

name: Tauros
desc: Tauros is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its wild and untamed nature. It is often seen charging and rampaging.

name: Magikarp
desc: Magikarp is a Water-type Pokemon known for its feeble and floppy appearance. It evolves into the powerful Gyarados.
